comment._content: I live in another  poor country , I am old lathe operator  from  Russia , I am accidentally got find this beautiful  site , with the photos of the Workers of the past … simple Workers  … but so much respect  from the US  people of our day for them … Great memory for the past  – and –Great country now ! Long Live America ! PS - during  10 years I cannot to find lathe operator in internet – simply to talk with him or her about the way of working day at your factory, mill, etc. May be now and here I’ll find the friend ? my e-male –moroz49@list.ru
